## loops {.tabset}
```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
for (subject in adsl$USUBJID[1:5]){
    cat('\n')
    cat("###", subject, "\n")
    ae_info=adae %>% filter(USUBJID==subject)
    cat("#### Adverse Event:", ae_info$AETERM, "\n")
}
```
